T02D1831:180b-1: panytsa kra ma ma ti t'i k'a tsandra pra bha n'a ma /

T02D1831:181b-0: @181b bsgrib pa glo bur pa'i tshogs ma lus pa

T02D1831:181b-32: sku'o // mkha' dang mnyam gyur ni 'dra bar rtogs pa ste /

T02D1831:182a-1: zhi ba ni shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'o //

T02D1831:182a-3: de ltar nyon mongs pa la sogs pa mi mthun

T02D1831:182a-17: bdag gzhan rab phan zhes pa ni chos kyi sku nyid do //

T02D1831:182b-45: // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ni rnam par rtog pa yin pas /

T02D1831:183b-38: ba'o // ba'i don to // gnyis pa phra ba'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste /
T02D1831:183b-39: lnga ba lhan cig skyes pa ni rigs lnga'i kha dog gang yang rung ba'o //
T02D1831:183b-40: rin chen zhes pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu
T02D1831:183b-41: rin po che lta bu dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i phyir
T02D1831:184a-1: bo phyag mtshan g-yas pa'i dang por bshad pas so //
T02D1831:184a-2: sna ni sna'i dbang po ste rin chen zhes bya
T02D1831:184a-3: ba ni sems brtan par gyur na phyag mtshan dang
T02D1831:184a-4: des nye bar mtshon pa'i brtan pa dang g-yo ba
T02D1831:184a-5: las sangs rgyas kyi tshogs gzhan don du spro bar
T02D1831:184a-6: bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1831:184a-7: rang gi 'od zer 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od
T02D1831:184a-8: zer gang yin pa de sangs rgyas gang la yod
T02D1831:184a-9: pa'o // da ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1831:184a-10: slong mo zhes bya ba'i drang don ni go sla'o //
T02D1831:184a-11: nges pa'i don ni gang la yi ge tha dad par yod pa de ni bhi ksha ste /
T02D1831:184a-12: brjod par bya ba'i sngags kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1831:184a-13: de la mngon du phyogs pas bzlas par mi bya'o //
T02D1831:184a-14: gal te bzlas na de'i tshe de la chags par mi bya'o //
T02D1831:184a-15: sngags ni yi ge gsum ste /
T02D1831:184a-16: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bzlas so //
T02D1831:184a-17: yan lag nyams pa ni thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'o //
T02D1831:184a-18: ngag gi bzlas pa bshad pa ni brjod nas zhes bya'o //
T02D1831:184a-19: rdo rje ni yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i sngags te /
T02D1831:184a-20: lhag pa'i lha spro zhing ngag tu bzlas so //
T02D1831:184a-21: bzlas pa'i rjes la spros pa'i lha rnams rang la bsdu'o //
T02D1831:184a-22: don dam ni mchog gi zhi ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1831:184a-24: sgron ma gsal bar don gzhan du bshad pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyi ste /
T02D1831:184a-25: 'phags pas gsungs pa'i ngag gi bzlas pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i ma yin no //
T02D1831:184a-26: gzhug par bya zhes pa ni rim mam cig car gyis so //
T02D1831:184a-27: drod gsher las skyes pa'i rnam par dag pas zhu
T02D1831:184a-28: ba'i thig le'i tshul de gzhag go zhes zer ba
T02D1831:184a-29: ni dbugs rlung bzhin du kun du mi dmigs pa'i
T02D1831:184a-30: ming can yang dag pa'i mthar rab tu gzhag go
T02D1831:184a-31: zhes bya ba'i don mi shes pa kho na'o //
T02D1831:184a-32: khyod ces pa ni mdun du bzhugs pa lta bur bsams la spyan mas bskul par ro //
T02D1831:184a-33: rdo rje'i thugs ni sems la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:184a-34: gnas kyi dbang phyug ni khams gsum du chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:184a-35: sems can kyi [*gyi] khams ni 'byung po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas so //
T02D1831:184a-36: dga' ba ni rol pa ste de la spro ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D1831:184a-37: don chen ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ste /
T02D1831:184b-0: @184b 'dir rten gsol zhes pa ni dga' bar bgyis pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-1: yab gcig ces pa ni sems can thams cad skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:184b-2: gnyen mchog chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:184b-3: m'a ma k'is bskul ba ni nyams pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku'o //
T02D1831:184b-4: sku ni sems can kun la phan pa'i rjes su bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-5: sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga ste /
T02D1831:184b-6: de dag don ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-7: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-8: mchog tu ni de bden pa gnyis kyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i bde ba chen po'i snying po'o //
T02D1831:184b-9: de sems can rnams la bstan pas phan par ston pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-10: chags pas ni chags pa rnam par sbyangs pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-11: chags pa'i dam tshig ni chags pa la spyod pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-12: gos dkar mos bskul ba sems can gyi khams kun
T02D1831:184b-13: la dga' ba'i phyir spyod pas sems can gyi khams
T02D1831:184b-14: kun du bzang po ni dge ba gang las so
T02D1831:184b-15: // sgron mas rdo rje'i 'dod pa ni sems can thams cad dga' bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:184b-16: dam tshig ni las kyi rigs can rnams te /
T02D1831:184b-18: gdung mchog ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-19: yon tan gang gi phyir dga' ba dang dga' bral
T02D1831:184b-20: dang dga' ba bar ma dang 'od gsal gyi ye
T02D1831:184b-21: shes bdag gis bskyed pa yin no //
T02D1831:184b-22: de ltar tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi lha mo rnams kyis bskul ba dang /
T02D1831:184b-23: sngon gyi smon lam gyis stong pa nyid kyi sbyor bas las bzhengs pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-24: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'di'i rdo rje'i thugs bskyod mi nus pas mi bskyod rdo rje'o //
T02D1831:184b-25: ye shes chen po'i ni stong pa bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pas so //
T02D1831:184b-26: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje'i dbyings so //
T02D1831:184b-27: bden pa gnyis mkhyen pas mkhas pa chen po'o //
T02D1831:184b-28: sku dang spros pa dang don dam dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin pas dkyil 'khor gsum mo //
T02D1831:184b-29: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i mchog yin no //
T02D1831:184b-31: rnam par snang mdzad ni 'od gsal gyi mes snang bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1831:184b-32: de nyid kyi phyir dag pa chen po'o //
T02D1831:185a-0: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs @185a * //
T02D1831:185a-1: pa rnams te de rnam par dag pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba ni drug pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-2: dgyes chen zhes pa ni mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin yin pas so //
T02D1831:185a-3: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams ston cig kye'i rdo rje zhes pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-4: rin chen rgyal po ni rin chen gyi rigs can rnams la dga' ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-5: rab tu zab pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:185a-6: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje nam mkha'i dri ma med de /
T02D1831:185a-7: gdod nas dag pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-8: chos thams cad kyi ma rig par gos pa med pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-9: dpag med rdo rje rgyal po che //
T02D1831:185a-10: zhe pa ni rigs lnga'i rigs rnams la dbang chen por gyur pas so //
T02D1831:185a-12: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-13: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas ni don yod
T02D1831:185a-14: grub pa'i rigs can rnams kyis bskur ba'i phyir ro
T02D1831:185a-15: // dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'od gsal ba ste de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:185a-16: bstod nas ni bdag nyid bstod du bcug pa dang /
T02D1831:185a-17: lha mo rnams kyis mchod du bcug nas so //
T02D1831:185a-18: rjes chags zhes pa ni spros nas lha mo'i 'khor
T02D1831:185a-19: la 'khyud de bde ba chen po dang ldan par
T02D1831:185a-20: byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i de kho na
T02D1831:185a-21: nyid kyi mchog 'od gsal dang ro gcig pa bde
T02D1831:185a-22: ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams
T02D1831:185a-23: yongs su dag pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i rang
T02D1831:185a-25: 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba rnams te /
T02D1831:185a-26: de rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-27: gcig pu ni de dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-28: rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i yi ge h'um spros te /
T02D1831:185a-29: yongs su gyur pa las sems can rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du bsams la /
T02D1831:185a-30: de'i yid dang ldan pas sbyang do zhes thams cad kyi don bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1831:185a-31: h'um nyid snying po bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas h'um gi snying po'o //
T02D1831:185a-32: de ltar 'dir drod gsher las skyes pa'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1831:185a-33: ting nge 'dzin ni mgo steng gi nam mkha' la
T02D1831:185a-34: aom las byung ba mgo thur du bstan pa'i yi
T02D1831:185a-35: ge aom gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1831:185b-0: 'khor las bdud @185b rtsi'i rgyun gyis bdag nyid gsal
T02D1831:185b-1: gdab par bya'o // zan la sogs pa bdud rtsi
T02D1831:185b-2: lnga dang sgron ma lnga'i rang bzhin yi ge aom
T02D1831:185b-3: gyis mtshan pa'i nang du bsam pa ste /
T02D1831:185b-4: steng du h'um las byung ba'i mes bzhu zhing bskol ba dan /
T02D1831:185b-5: a'a: yig gis dri ma med par byas nas ye
T02D1831:185b-6: shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du mos pa ni
T02D1831:185b-8: dung zhes pa ni dung dmar po'i rnam par can gyi mgrin pa bsams nas de'i steng du padma'o //
T02D1831:185b-9: sprin gyi sgra ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1831:185b-10: sreg pa ni bdud rtsi myang bya'o //
T02D1831:185b-11: de nas rlung gis me bskyod /
T02D1831:185b-12: nges chu bskol te des kyang kha zas bzhu nas
T02D1831:185b-13: zas de yang steng 'og gi rlung kha sbyor gyis
T02D1831:185b-15: de'i snyigs ma ni thal ba bzhin 'thob pa de
T02D1831:185b-16: tsam gyis las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba
T02D1831:185b-18: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pas grub pa'i rdo rje
T02D1831:185b-19: 'chang gi skur lhag par mos pa tsam ni lus
T02D1831:185b-21: 'di ltar skabs dang por yang rang bzhin gyis yongs
T02D1831:185b-22: su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid du
T02D1831:185b-23: mos pas brtan par nus kyang /
T02D1831:185b-24: sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi
T02D1831:185b-25: bdag nyid du mos pa ni mi nus so zhes
T02D1831:185b-26: dgongs nas spyod bsdus kyi lus rnam par dben pa'i
T02D1831:185b-27: le'ur bdag rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag go zhes
T02D1831:185b-28: rang nyid brten par bskyed nas /
T02D1831:185b-29: rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1831:185b-30: rdo rje 'chang chen por lhag par mos pa ni
T02D1831:185b-31: byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas brjod do zhes gsungs
T02D1831:185b-32: so // gang gi phyir skabs 'dir phal cher lus
T02D1831:185b-33: la bems po'i rdul phra rab kyi phung po'i rang
T02D1831:185b-34: bzhin du 'khrul pa ni ngang gis 'byung la /
T02D1831:185b-35: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i de kho na
T02D1831:185b-36: nyid kyi bdag nyid yid kyi skur lhag par mos
T02D1831:185b-37: pas shin tu 'bad kyang brgya lam tsam las mi
T02D1831:185b-39: mi bstan pa'i rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor du brjod do //
T02D1831:185b-40: de bas na 'di ni pa dang mtshungs pas spyod pa bsdus pa'i le'u drug pa las gsungs pa /
T02D1831:185b-41: lus kyi dben pa la lha'i sku med de zhes pa ste /
T02D1831:185b-42: rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa yid kyi sku'o zhes bya ba mdor bsdus pa'i dgongs 'grel lo //
T02D1831:186a-0: rdo rje bzlas pa'i zhes pa ni ngag tu brjod @186a * //
T02D1831:186a-1: par bya ba ni ma yin pa dang /
T02D1831:186a-2: gzhan gyis mi phyed cing stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i phyir /
T02D1831:186a-3: bzlas pa ni yid kho nas bsam par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:186a-4: de la goms pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1831:186a-5: pas mdor bsdus pa'i rim pas spros pa dang bcas
T02D1831:186a-6: pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba'i lha'i sku 'khor dang
T02D1831:186a-7: bcas pa ste / rdo rje bzlas pa'ang de ltar
T02D1831:186a-8: bsgom pa goms shing dang por de'i yan lag tu
T02D1831:186a-9: bshad pas bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam par gzhag go
T02D1831:186a-10: bcas pa ste / // 'di ltar spyod pa bsdus
T02D1831:186a-11: pa'i dag dben gyi mthar nye bar bzhed pa de
T02D1831:186a-12: ltar gsung gi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
T02D1831:186a-13: pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa las 'das nas sems kyi
T02D1831:186a-14: dben pa rjes su tshol lo zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1831:186a-15: skad cig gis yongs su rdzogs pa lha'i skur skad
T02D1831:186a-16: cig gis dmigs pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste
T02D1831:186a-17: / de la ltos pa nyid kyis spyod bsdus las /
T02D1831:186a-18: ngag gi rnam par dben pa ni bskyed rim pa
T02D1831:186a-19: la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no
T02D1831:186a-20: zhes gsungs so // rnam pa thams cad kyi rdzogs
T02D1831:186a-21: pa'i rim pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i sku nyid
T02D1831:186a-22: zhes gsungs so // do // de sgom pa'i thabs yin pa dang /
T02D1831:186a-23: skad cig gis rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgom pa'i phyir rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang /
T02D1831:186a-24: sgyu ma lta bu'i lha'i sku dang 'od gsal ba rab tu 'jug pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1831:186a-25: 'di ltar skad cig gis lha'i bdag nyid du bsgyur
T02D1831:186a-26: bas dang po bya ba dang smra ba la sogs
T02D1831:186a-27: pa dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kun byed pa'i snying dang bshad lam dang /
T02D1831:186a-28: lta ba dang mgrin pa dang lus thams cad la
T02D1831:186a-29: gnas pa'i srog rlung dang thur sel dang mnyam gnas
T02D1831:186a-30: dang / gyen rgyu dang khyab byed kyi bdag nyid can dang /
T02D1831:186a-31: mig gi dbang po la sogs par gnas pa'i ni klu dang /
T02D1831:186a-32: rus sbal dang rtsangs pa dang /
T02D1831:186a-35: rnam pa bcur 'gyur ba'i rnam shes rlung gi de nyid blta bar bya ste /
T02D1831:186a-36: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam par ro gcig
T02D1831:186a-37: tu gyur pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin byang chub sems
T02D1831:186a-38: de nyid dgongs pa lung ston du gsungs pa /
T02D1831:186a-39: rlung ni byang chub sems yin te /
T02D1831:186a-40: nam mkha' las ni rnam gnas pa //
T02D1831:186a-43: 'di ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di //
T02D1831:186b-0: phung po la sogs gnyis su med dang @186b mnyam //
T02D1831:186b-1: shes rab thabs cig sbyor ba yis //
T02D1831:186b-3: zhes pas ji ltar phung po la sogs pa'i gnyis
T02D1831:186b-4: su med pa'i sems yin pa de ltar rlung yin
T02D1831:186b-5: no // de'i rjes su ji srid 'jig rten brda rnams ni //
T02D1831:186b-6: de bzhin sna tshogs rtag pa rnams //
T02D1831:186b-7: byang chub sems la byung pa de //
T02D1831:186b-8: rtag tu rnam rtog rlung la sogs //
T02D1831:186b-9: zhes dgongs pa lung ston du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:186b-10: rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu rlung yin pas nang du
T02D1831:186b-11: rtog pa'i bdag nyid can ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa
T02D1831:186b-12: yin no // de ni aom a'a: h'um zhes pa
T02D1831:186b-13: yi ge gsum dbugs drub pa dang gnas pa dang
T02D1831:186b-14: 'byung ba'i rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa sngags
T02D1831:186b-15: kyi dmigs pa gang yin pa de la slob pa
T02D1831:186b-16: yin no // yin no // de la brtan pa
T02D1831:186b-17: thob nas sems kyi dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1831:186b-18: du yongs su shes pa ste /
T02D1831:186b-19: des lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mtshan nyid rnams
T02D1831:186b-20: su shes rab dang thabs dang dmigs pa'i shes pa
T02D1831:186b-21: rnams ro gcig pa'i tshul du yid kyi rang bzhin
T02D1831:186b-22: lha'i sku sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kun
T02D1831:186b-23: rdzob kyi bden pa lus ngag yid kyis dmigs par
T02D1831:186b-26: de bag chags dang bcas pa rnam par sbyang ba ni 'od gsal don dam pa la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1831:186b-27: de nas kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam
T02D1831:186b-28: pa'i bden pa gcig tu byas par rgyu med pa'i
T02D1831:186b-29: ye shes kyi rang bzhin rdo rje lta bu'i ting
T02D1831:186b-30: nge 'dzin zung du 'jug pa'i rgyun gyis rim pa
T02D1831:186b-32: de yang mthar thug pa'i 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid can ni //
T02D1831:186b-34: dang por rgyu'i skabs su ni de'i mos pas sgom
T02D1831:186b-35: pa'i phyir rdzogs ba'i rnal 'byor du brjod ces bya
T02D1831:186b-36: ba ni brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i bsdus don yin
T02D1831:186b-37: no // sna'i rtse mor ni sna'i dbang po'i bu gar ro //
T02D1831:186b-38: 'gro ba yin pas na yungs 'bru tsam yin pas yungs kar phra bar 'dra bas rlung yin no //
T02D1831:186b-39: 'gro ba ni yi ge ae dang h'um dag go //
T02D1831:186b-40: mi 'gro ba ni yi ge a'a: yin no //
T02D1831:186b-41: ye shes gnas ni snang ba dang /
T02D1831:186b-43: snang ba thob pa'i ye shes pa gsum gyis sbyor bas so //
T02D1831:186b-44: mchog ni dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:186b-45: gsang ba ni lha'i bskyed pa'i rim pa tsam bsgom pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pas so //
T02D1831:187a-1: 'od gsal gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:187a-2: kha dog lnga ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1831:187a-3: pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin me long lta
T02D1831:187a-4: bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga'i ngo bo 'od
T02D1831:187a-5: lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:187a-6: rin po che zhes pa ni rlung brtan par 'gyur
T02D1831:187a-7: bas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur dgos
T02D1831:187a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:187a-10: snying po las zhes pa ni lus rnam par dben pa las so //
T02D1831:187a-11: ye shes lnga'i ngo bo ni rlung brtan par gyur
T02D1831:187a-12: na rim pa phyi ma phyi ma la goms pas
T02D1831:187a-13: me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa skye
T02D1831:187a-15: skyes na ni de'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1831:187a-16: nyid ces pa ni rlung gi ngo bos so //
T02D1831:187a-17: dbus na ni de dang bdag gcig pos lha ni ye shes gsum ste /
T02D1831:187a-18: sngags dang lha tha mi dad par mos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:187a-19: mi gsal ba ni don dam par rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D1831:187a-20: gsal ba ni kun rdzob tu'o //
T02D1831:187a-21: gso bar byed pa dbugs te /
T02D1831:187a-22: steng du gnas pa'i rlung yin no //
T02D1831:187a-23: de dbang po gnyis sprad pa'i sbyor pas 'dod chags
T02D1831:187a-24: chen po'i mes zhu nas rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon
T02D1831:187a-25: te / shes rab ma'i padma'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems thig le'u tshul du lhung ste /
T02D1831:187a-26: gang bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul du bsgom pa'o //
T02D1831:187a-27: rlung de nyid steng ni sna'i bu gnas dkyil 'khor
T02D1831:187a-28: bzhi'i rim pa las 'byung ba ni srog rtsol zhes
T02D1831:187a-29: bya brjod de / 'tsho bar byed pas srog kyang yin la /
T02D1831:187a-30: snang ba gsum gang yang rung ba'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1831:187a-31: bye brag spro ba sems kun nas sdud pa ni
T02D1831:187a-32: rtsol pa yin pas srog rtsol te rlung yin no
T02D1831:187a-34: rlung gi gang dang gang du gnas //
T02D1831:187a-35: rang bzhin de dang der 'gyur ro //
T02D1831:187a-37: srog ni tshe ste rtsol ba ni de ring du
T02D1831:187a-38: gang gis gtong ba de ni srog rtsel gyi rlung
T02D1831:187a-39: zhes sgron gsal du gsungs so //
T02D1831:187a-40: de la srog dang sems dang 'tsho ba rnams ni rnam grangs te /
T02D1831:187a-41: gang gi phyir srog ni sems su 'dod ces rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:187a-42: dbugs de nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1831:187a-43: snying gar rang gi sngags ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsams la /
T02D1831:187a-44: de'i thig le'i steng du n'a da'i rnam pa'i rang
T02D1831:187b-0: bzhin gyi sems ni yid kyi ngo @187b bor bsam
T02D1831:187b-1: par bya'o // 'dis srog rtsol gyi yan lag bshad zin to //
T02D1831:187b-2: yan lag drug kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1831:187b-3: nges par 'byung ba ni srog rtsol lo //
T02D1831:187b-4: lkog ma dang lte ba dang gsang ba'i padmar 'gro
T02D1831:187b-5: ba dang 'ong ba ni phal cher shas che ba'i
T02D1831:187b-6: me dang chu dang rlung dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1831:187b-7: dbye bas rim pa nye bar mtshon pa gnas pa
T02D1831:187b-8: yang ngo // 'od kyi 'od kyi bdag nyid can gyi rlung yin no //
T02D1831:187b-9: sna'i bug g-yas pa'i ngos kyi steng du rgyu ba'i rlung ni me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1831:187b-10: g-yon gyi ngos su thad kar rgyu ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1831:187b-11: drang po gnyis ka las rgyu ba ni sa'i 'khor lo 'o //
T02D1831:187b-12: 'og tu rgyu ba ni chu'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin
T02D1831:187b-13: lus thams cad la khyab par byed pa'i rlung gang
T02D1831:187b-14: yin pa de ni bde ba skyed pa'i 'os su
T02D1831:187b-15: gyur pas bde ba'i tshul du nam mkha'i rang bzhin
T02D1831:187b-16: te / de'i tshe re re'i 'od zer dkar po'i
T02D1831:187b-17: ngo bo ni mngal nas phyir 'byung ba nas brtsams
T02D1831:187b-18: nas la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi'i gang yang rung ba
T02D1831:187b-19: sna'i bug nas byung ba dang lhan cig 'gro'o //
T02D1831:187b-20: spyod pa bsdus par 'di kho na bzhin du gsungs te /
T02D1831:187b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can gyi 'od zer rnams 'byung ste /
T02D1831:187b-22: nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor phyi sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi la khyab pa'o //
T02D1831:187b-23: rlung bcu po ni 'byung ba dang chus par 'gyur
T02D1831:187b-24: zhing 'khor lo bzhi'i bdag nyid can 'byung ba lnga'i
T02D1831:187b-26: shi ba'i lus la ni khyab byed thams cad nges par 'thon la /
T02D1831:187b-27: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni sa la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D1831:187b-28: 'khor bzhin du rang dbang gis tha dad du 'byung
T02D1831:187b-30: gzhung gzhan du byung nas tha dad du nam mkha'i
T02D1831:187b-31: dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni mu stegs rnams gdul ba'i
T02D1831:187b-33: dper na snod kyi 'jig rten gyi tshad bstan pa lta bu'o //
T02D1831:187b-34: 'di yang rgyas par brgyud pa'i snye mar nges par dpyad zin to //
T02D1831:187b-35: rtog ge rnams ni snying rlung can no //
T02D1831:187b-36: rnal 'byor byis pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha tsam sgom pa rnams so //
T02D1831:187b-37: bdag nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ste /
T02D1831:187b-38: de'i sku las yi ge aom dang /
T02D1831:187b-39: gsung las yi ge a'a: dang /
T02D1831:187b-40: thugs las yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1831:187b-41: tshig gi lam ni zhal te nges par brjod pa ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D1831:188a-1: 'am ma ni nga gi rang bzhin gyi yi ge rnams te /
T02D1831:188a-2: de gang du btus par gyur pa rnams ni sngags btus pa'o //
T02D1831:188a-3: de ni yi ge aom la sogs pa rnams kyi sku la rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
T02D1831:188a-4: de rtogs pa ni stod pa nyid dang ro gcig
T02D1831:188a-5: pas rgyun mchad par spro ba'i dus gsum du bzhugs
T02D1831:188a-6: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams brtags pa ni rang
T02D1831:188a-7: bzhin med par rtogs pa rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste
T02D1831:188a-8: / 'dis rang bzhin med pa'i bsgom pa kho na la 'bad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:188a-9: tshig 'dis don rtogs pa ste 'dir ngag yin no //
T02D1831:188a-10: dpal ldan ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1831:188a-11: sems can thams cad ni khams gcig rigs dang skye
T02D1831:188a-12: gnas kyi dbye bas dpag tu med de de'i tshul
T02D1831:188a-13: gyis 'byung ba'i tshul ni kun rdzob pa ste don
T02D1831:188a-14: dam par rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D1831:188a-15: de bas thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1831:188a-16: de kho na nyid zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1831:188a-17: can rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de rtogs pa
T02D1831:188a-18: yin pas de bstan par gsal lo //
T02D1831:188a-19: rgyud gzhan du bstan zin mod ces pa la lan gsungs pa //
T02D1831:188a-20: sgrub pa zhes bya ba la sog pa ste /
T02D1831:188a-21: dgongs pa ma rig par khyab bdag gi gsungs dag
T02D1831:188a-22: gang yin pa de ni bdag nyid kyi ste dbang
T02D1831:188a-23: du byas nas 'di gsungs pa yin la /
T02D1831:188a-24: bdag kho nas gsang ba'i don 'di rig pa yin
T02D1831:188a-25: gyi gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes pa'i tshig ni
T02D1831:188a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'jig par byed do //
T02D1831:188a-27: 'di ltar mthar thug pa'i zung du 'jug pa ni
T02D1831:188a-28: de bzhin du lhag par mos pa dang de rtogs
T02D1831:188a-29: pa'i thabs brjod pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi
T02D1831:188a-31: de las gzhan ni ma yin no zhes pa ni dgongs pa'o //
T02D1831:188a-32: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni mi rtog ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1831:188a-33: som nyi med pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1831:188a-34: thun mong ni gzhan dag gis kyang thos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:188a-35: rgyas par bshad cing yi ge gsum bsdus te dang po zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1831:188a-36: dang po yang yin la gcig kyang yin pas aa'o //
T02D1831:188a-37: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sde tshan dgu yi ge bzhi
T02D1831:188a-38: bcu zhe dgu'i bdag nyid can gyi bcu tshan bzhi
T02D1831:188a-39: dang yi ge brgyad kyi dbus ma byas pa ni
T02D1831:188a-40: yi ge ha'o // dang po'i gcig po de dang
T02D1831:188a-41: yi ge ni ha ni bcings med du shes par
T02D1831:188b-0: yi ge ha'o // bya'o // dbyangs yig bcu @188b drug ni sde tshan dang po'o //
T02D1831:188b-1: nga nya na na ma zhes lnga pa'i lnga pa ni yi ge ma'o //
T02D1831:188b-2: de ltar byas pas bzhi dang gsum ni gsum ste de dag sbyar ba ni 'brel bar bya'o //
T02D1831:188b-3: de la dang por aa au ma yi ge rnams so //
T02D1831:188b-4: dbus su yi ge aa gnyis dang tsheg drag dang ma ste bzhi'o //
T02D1831:188b-5: tha mar ha au mu rnams so //
T02D1831:188b-6: dbus su aa tsheg drag gcig byas nas re re la gsum ste /
T02D1831:188b-8: sku gsung thugs ro gcig tu gyur pa ni thig le la sogs pa dang bcas par byed pa'o //
T02D1831:188b-9: ring po ni dbus aa yig go //
T02D1831:188b-10: yon tan ni dang po'i aa la ao yig go //
T02D1831:188b-11: sbyor ba ni ha dang a'u'o //
T02D1831:188b-12: bsrubs pa ni yi ge au dang dbus su aa gnyis dang klad kor ro //
T02D1831:188b-13: des phan tshun du ma 'brel bar bstan to //
T02D1831:188b-17: gang gi phyir aa'i sbyor ba'i yi ge rnams phan
T02D1831:188b-18: tshun tha dad du brjod par nus kyi gzhan du
T02D1831:188b-20: de'i phyir aa yig gis khyab pa'i phyir du ma
T02D1831:188b-21: ma yin rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pas gcig
T02D1831:188b-23: yi ge don dam par skye ba med cing rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D1831:188b-24: des khyab ba'i ngag gi rang bzhin thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1831:188b-25: stong pa nyid las byung ba'i spros pa med pa'i sngags btu ba yang bstan to //
T02D1831:188b-26: sngar bshad pa'i gsal byed rnams kyi dbyangs yig rnams te mo rigs so //
T02D1831:188b-27: mngon par phyogs pa ni ga la sogs pa'i pho'i ming rnams so //
T02D1831:188b-29: ri r'i li l'i rnams ni ma nid [*ning?] du rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1831:188b-30: sgra'i bstan bcos las ni rnam pa gzhan du bshad do //
T02D1831:188b-31: de ltar btus pa'i yi ge gsum 'og gi tha mar h'um dang /
T02D1831:188b-32: steng gi thog mar aom dang /
T02D1831:188b-33: bar du a'a: zhes pa rim pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1831:188b-34: de ltar brjod pa'i sngags kyis yid kyi bzhon par
T02D1831:188b-35: 'gyur ba'i n'a da don dam pa rang bzhin med
T02D1831:188b-37: byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1831:188b-38: des rgyud bzhin du sngags thams cad kyang bden pa
T02D1831:188b-39: gnyis tha mi dad par rtogs shing zlos te gzhan
T02D1831:188b-40: du 'dod pa'i don mi 'grub po zhes dgongs pa
T02D1831:188b-41: yin no // de nas ni sngags bzlas te /
T02D1831:188b-42: bskyed rim bsgoms nas gzugs ni gzugs sku'o //
T02D1831:189a-1: bar dmigs pa de ni nye bar dmigs pa'i ming can te /
T02D1831:189a-2: bden pa gnyis las tha mi dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1831:189a-3: de nyid gsum ni yi ge gsum las te /
T02D1831:189a-4: bdag gcig pa'i tshul du gnas pa ste /
T02D1831:189a-5: sngags kyi de kho na byang chub sems so //
T02D1831:189a-6: aa ni gzhom du med pa'i n'a da ste /
T02D1831:189a-7: de'i tshul gyis gnyis su med pa'i yi ge snying
T02D1831:189a-8: gar gsal bar bsgoms pa na thugs su 'gyur ro
T02D1831:189a-9: // rdo rje snying po'i rgyan las kyang //
T02D1831:189a-10: mar me lta bur 'bar ba yi //
T02D1831:189a-11: snying ga'i dbus su gzhom du med //
T02D1831:189a-12: yi ge mchog tu phra ba ste //
T02D1831:189a-13: aa yig mchog tu gtso bo yin //
T02D1831:189a-15: chos thams cad kyi sgo ni yi ge aa ste /
T02D1831:189a-16: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir zhes gsungs so
T02D1831:189a-17: zhes bya ba 'dis bsam gtan thams cad kyi sgo
T02D1831:189a-18: sa bon gyi gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyis aa
T02D1831:189a-19: yig gsungs so // gzhom du med pa ni dngos
T02D1831:189a-20: po dang dngos med pa la sogs par sgro 'dogs
T02D1831:189a-21: pa'i spros pas gzhom du med pa'o //
T02D1831:189a-22: yi ge ni nyams pa med pa ste /
T02D1831:189a-23: don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:189a-24: thabs dang shes rab kyi gzhi ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i phyir gnas so //
T02D1831:189a-25: yan lag ma nyams pa ni rlung dang tha mi dad par ro //
T02D1831:189a-26: des rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D1831:189a-27: snying ga'i aa yig n'a nga'i steng du yi ge
T02D1831:189a-28: aa gnas la yi ge aom gyis sems can rnams
T02D1831:189a-30: sna bug las n'a da de nyid la rab tu 'jug ste /
T02D1831:189a-31: sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i sems can de nyid la
T02D1831:189a-32: spro ba'i yi ge h'um gis stong par byed do
T02D1831:189a-33: // de la 'jug pa gnas pa ldang ba'i byang
T02D1831:189a-34: chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid can aom a'a: h'um
T02D1831:189a-35: zhes bya ba rim pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1831:189a-36: gos dkar la sogs pa ni gos dkar mo dang /
T02D1831:189a-40: me rlung sa chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1831:189a-41: so sor byung ba las ni 'byung ba rnams kyi grangs byas pa'o //
T02D1831:189a-42: 'dir sa chu me rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi'i grangs sor nyis brgya lnga bcu ste /
T02D1831:189a-43: thun phyed la dbugs dgu brgya rgyu'o //
T02D1831:189a-44: khar yang 'pho ste thun phyed la bzhi'o //
T02D1831:189a-45: de ltar thun phyed nyi shu rtsa bzhi la dkyil
T02D1831:189a-46: 'khor bzhi'i 'pho ba ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste
T02D1831:189a-47: / nyin zhag gcig la nyi khri chig stong drug brgyar 'gyur ba ni bzlas pa'i grangs so //
T02D1831:189b-0: @189b 'dir la lan re sna bug gcig las bar mchad par rlung 'pho ba gnyis rgyu la /
T02D1831:189b-1: de'i rjes su 'pho ba gcig tu bshad pa ni mgrin pa'i rtsa 'dab bcu drug la bshad do //
T02D1831:189b-2: gzhan dag na re sna bug gcig la 'pho ba phyed dang gnyis /
T02D1831:189b-3: de'i rjes su sna bug gzhan du 'pho ba phyed
T02D1831:189b-4: dang gnyis rgyu bas nyin zhag gcig la 'pho ba
T02D1831:189b-6: lte ba'i padma'i rim pa gsum pa'i rtsa 'dab bzhi
T02D1831:189b-7: dor te 'pho ba gcig gnyis su rnam par bzhag
T02D1831:189b-8: pas phyi rol gyi 'pho ba dang mthun par bya'o
T02D1831:189b-9: // yang na byi dang nang thams cad du mthun par gzhag pa ni mi dgos so //
T02D1831:189b-10: phyogs gnyis ka la phyi dang nang du 'pho ba
T02D1831:189b-11: phyed dang gnyis kyi thun phyed nas gzhag pa yin
T02D1831:189b-12: no // rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa las
T02D1831:189b-13: ni 'pho ba re res nang thun phyed du gzhag
T02D1831:189b-14: pa tsam la 'gal ba med do //
T02D1831:189b-15: 'di lta bu'i rgyas par bshad pa ni brgyud pa'i snye ma las shes par bya'o //
T02D1831:189b-16: rig ma ni shes rab ste /
T02D1831:189b-17: de gtso bor byas pa'i theg pa ni rdo rje'i theg pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-18: yi ge'i grangs kyis ni 'bum tsho gsum mo //
T02D1831:189b-19: phyi rol bzlas pa ni ngag tu bzlas pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-20: sngags kyi don ni 'grub par bya'o //
T02D1831:189b-21: de yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje can gyi bdag
T02D1831:189b-22: nyid dngos po yin pas de bsgom pa'i bar chad
T02D1831:189b-23: byed pa mtshon pa'i yig 'bru ngag tu mi bzlas
T02D1831:189b-24: so // gzhan ni des mtshon pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-25: sbyor ba gsum ni rdo rje gsum dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-26: myur ba ni 'byung ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1831:189b-27: gnyis ka min pa ni gnas pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-28: brtan pa ni mi g-yo bar gyur ba'i rlung las so //
T02D1831:189b-29: gsang zhing dgongs ni nang gi rlung ste /
T02D1831:189b-30: kha cig [*zhig] na re dgongs pa lung bstan zer ro //
T02D1831:189b-31: klog pa ni ngag tu brjod pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-32: bsam gtan ni sems khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-33: bsten pa ni zhag gsum pas stong phrag bzhi bcu
T02D1831:189b-34: zhe brgyad bcas pa 'bum phrag drug gi bsnyen pa'o
T02D1831:189b-35: // phyag byas ni rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i don to //
T02D1831:189b-36: sngags ni ngag tu brjod pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-37: gzung ba ni btsan thabs su rlung gzung pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-38: gzhan dang gzhan ni mchod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1831:189b-39: ngag tu brjod pa'i sngags dang sbyin sreg la sogs
T02D1831:189b-40: pas bsgrub par bya ba ni sems bzlas pa kho
T02D1831:189b-41: nas 'grub po zhes pa yig la sogs pas bshad
T02D1831:190a-0: de / ya'i don ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor las @190a * //
T02D1831:190a-1: gnyis ni dngos dang shugs gnyis te /
T02D1831:190a-2: dper na chu'i dkyil 'khor rgyub [*rgyu ba?] la zhi ba'i las grub la /
T02D1831:190a-3: gang na gnas yod pa'i sar bzhi ka yod de /
T02D1831:190a-4: sa la sogs pa yod pas rgyas pa dang dbang
T02D1831:190a-5: du byed pa dang mngon spyod rnams ni shugs las
T02D1831:190a-6: 'byung ngo // 'bras bu chung ba'i phyir dag tu
T02D1831:190a-7: bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa ni mchod
T02D1831:190a-8: pa la sogs pa spang bar bya ba bstan te
T02D1831:190a-9: 'byung ngo // / rnam par dag pa ni sdig pa zad pas so //
T02D1831:190a-10: 'byor pa ni 'jig rten gsum gyi phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1831:190a-11: bsam gtan ni 'dir rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang /
T02D1831:190a-12: sgyu lus dang 'od gsal gyi rim pa zung du 'jug pa'i sku bsgom pa'o //
T02D1831:190a-13: thar pa ni sgrib pa gnyis spang pa ste /
T02D1831:190a-14: gang gi phyir nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib
T02D1831:190a-15: pa gnyis kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
T02D1831:190a-16: pa gnyis la chags pas 'ching ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:190a-17: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D1831:190a-18: de dngos med ba shes rab nyid //
T02D1831:190a-20: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin snying rje dang
T02D1831:190a-21: stong pa tha mi dad pa de bzhin nyid don
T02D1831:190a-22: dam pa byang chub kyi sems bstan te de nyid
T02D1831:190a-23: bsgoms pas byis pa bzhin du yul rnams la zhen
T02D1831:190a-25: 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1831:190a-27: man ni gang du bstan pa'i yid do //
T02D1831:190a-28: tra ni skyob pa yin pas don dam pa'i byang chub sems sngags yin no //
T02D1831:190a-29: de goms pa yang lhun grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1831:190a-30: brjod pa dang nye bar dmigs pa dang brdar gyur pa ni kun rdzob pa'i sngags so //

T02D1831:193b-2: mi g-yo'i ting nge 'dzin ni rlung 'gog pa mtshams
T02D1831:193b-3: kyi bdag nyid snang ba thob pa dag pa ste
T02D1831:193b-4: / de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:193b-5: de nyid ni gsal ba ste spros pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:193b-6: rmad chen po ni rang bzhin gyis kyang so sor snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:193b-7: ye shes ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1831:193b-8: byang chub shing drung du bzhugs te mtshan phyed dus su rgyal ba'i gsung las /
T02D1831:193b-9: rgyal ba de dag gis bka' stsal ba'i shes rab
T02D1831:193b-10: ma las skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su rgyal ba'i
T02D1831:193b-12: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid can de kho na nyid 'od gsal ba dang /
T02D1831:193b-13: rang rig tu gsal ba rdo rje lta bu'i zung
T02D1831:193b-14: du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzigs par 'gyur ro
T02D1831:193b-15: // de ni nyon mongs pa dang phung po dang 'chi ba dag gi bdud 'joms par mdzad do //
T02D1831:193b-16: srod la ni lha'i bu'i bdud btul lo //
T02D1831:193b-17: 'dir gsang sngags kyi theg par ro //
T02D1831:193b-18: de nyid ni 'od gsal pa rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02D1831:193b-19: des bdag gcig pa'i tshul de'i rnam par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:193b-20: ye shes dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin zung du 'jug pa ni 'bras bu'o //
T02D1831:193b-21: rgyu'i gnas skabs su dga' ba bzhi dang ro gcig par myong ba dang /
T02D1831:193b-22: rang bzhin med pa ni tha mi dang pa kho na'o //
T02D1831:193b-23: chags pa dang chags pa bar ma dang chags bral gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1831:193b-24: mchog tu dga' ba dang dga' bral gyi bdag nyid
T02D1831:193b-25: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang gcig tu gyur
T02D1831:193b-26: pas tha dad du mi dmigs so //
T02D1831:193b-27: ye shes bzhi po de yang stong pa min te /
T02D1831:193b-28: kun rdzob tu bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:193b-29: mi stong min ni don dam pa rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:193b-30: stong pa dang stong pa ma yin pa las gzhan
T02D1831:193b-31: dbu mar gnas pa ni 'gal ba yang med do
T02D1831:193b-32: // ye shes gsum ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1831:193b-33: ba dang ro gcig pa'i ye shes gsum gyi rim
T02D1831:193b-34: pa gang yin pa de dang sbyor ro //
T02D1831:193b-35: de bas na de nyid kyi ye shes kho na las grol ba yin te /
T02D1831:193b-36: de yang bskyed rdzogs rim pa gnyis la goms pas
T02D1831:193b-37: las dang po pa'i sbyor bas rtsol ba dang bcas
T02D1831:193b-38: pa mtshan ma med pa'i sgom gyi sa brgyad pa
T02D1831:193b-39: mi g-yo ba'i sa rtogs nas /
T02D1831:193b-40: de nas brtsams te rtsol ba med par rgyu ba
T02D1831:193b-41: snang ba gsum dang gnyis su med par bde ba
T02D1831:194a-0: chen po'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i sku gzigs @194a *
T02D1831:194a-1: // shing 'od gsal lhag par rtogs la /
T02D1831:194a-2: zung du 'jug pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'og min du bzhugs pa /
T02D1831:194a-3: skye ba 'di 'am 'ga' zhig la thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
T02D1831:194a-4: goms pa de yang spyod pa gsum gang rung gis bya'o zhes gsungs pa ste /
T02D1831:194a-5: chos 'byung ba la sogs pa'i chos 'byung rtag tu
T02D1831:194a-6: brtan pas mngon par 'byung ba la slob par byed
T02D1831:194a-8: chos kyi dbyings ni chos 'byung ste /
T02D1831:194a-9: de snyed pa ji ltar bar dus 'ga' zhig tu
T02D1831:194a-10: brten pas mngon par byang chub pa kho na spyod
T02D1831:194a-11: pa yin gyi / phyi'i chos 'byung gis ni ma yin no //
T02D1831:194a-12: de ltar go rims bzhin du spros pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1831:194a-14: spros pa med pa'i spyod pa rnams kyis shing ta
T02D1831:194a-15: la dang ras bal tshig pa bzhin du yun ring
T02D1831:194a-16: ba dang thung ba dang shin tu thung bas dngos
T02D1831:194a-17: grub sgrub byed rnams kyis goms par byed do //
T02D1831:194a-18: de'i dbye ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams kyi dbye ba khyad par can no //
T02D1831:194a-19: bstan bcos mchu ni bstan bcos la ngal bar byas pa tsam mo //
T02D1831:194a-20: gnas drug ni mtha' drug go //
T02D1831:194a-21: sgrib pa rnams las ring du song bas 'phags pa'ang yin la /
T02D1831:194a-22: rdo rje'ang yin pas rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan klu sgrub bo //
T02D1831:194a-23: rim pa 'dis phal cher ye shes gsum gyi rang
T02D1831:194a-24: bzhin gyi dbye bas sems kyi dben pa gsal bar
T02D1831:194a-25: mdzad do // 'di ltar spyod bsdus las /
T02D1831:194a-26: rang bzhin gyi snang ba tsam shes pa ni sems dben gyi mthar thug go //
T02D1831:194a-27: de yang snang ba thams cad dang bcas shing mtshan
T02D1831:194a-28: ma dang ldan pa lha'i gzugs ni mi dmigs te
T02D1831:194a-29: / sems snang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1831:194a-30: 'dir dgongs pa bla na med pa bstan pa yin pas bla na med pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1831:194a-33: // / bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i bdag nyid kun rdzob
T02D1831:194a-34: kyi bden pa bsgom pa'i nus pa thob pas de
T02D1831:194a-35: nyid kyi don dam pa'i bdag nyid can rang bzhin
T02D1831:194a-36: 'od gsal bsgom pa la nges par sbyar ba'i phyir
T02D1831:194a-37: bshad de / thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1831:194a-38: mngon par byang chub ba'i 'od gsal rtogs pa'o //
T02D1831:194a-39: bla ma'i gsung gis spyod yul du ma gyur pa
T02D1831:194a-40: so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i de kho
T02D1831:194b-0: na nyid rtogs pa las byung ba ni rang @194b
T02D1831:194b-1: byung ngo // lhag pa'i lha ni rnam par shes
T02D1831:194b-2: pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod
T02D1831:194b-3: pa la sogs pa'i gtso bo'o //
T02D1831:194b-4: snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ga ni 'khyud pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1831:194b-5: snang ba ni stong pa bzhi myong zhing dga' ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1831:194b-6: byang chub sems bdud rtsi yin pas de'i snod ka la sha ni rdo rje nor bu ste /
T02D1831:194b-7: des rtse mor shin tu brtan par bzhag nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1831:194b-8: gang zag blo chung du yin na spyod bsdus las gsungs pa /
T02D1831:194b-9: bum pa'am yang na dung dkar la //
T02D1831:194b-10: byang chub sems ni bzhag nas su //
T02D1831:194b-11: de la dam tshig sbyin bya ste //
T02D1831:194b-12: gnyug ma'i phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
T02D1831:194b-13: zhes pa 'dir gnyug ma'i phyag rgya ni slob mas
T02D1831:194b-14: mngon sum rdo rje sems dpar mos nas sngar gang
T02D1831:194b-15: phul ba'o // khams gsum gyi sgro btags pa rnams dang /
T02D1831:194b-16: khyad par bral ba yin pas 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'o //
T02D1831:194b-17: nam mkha' dang mnyam gyur ni spros pa med pa ste /
T02D1831:194b-18: de nyid kyi phyir ci yang mi dmigs so //
T02D1831:194b-19: mi brten pa ni rten dang brten pa la sogs pa dang rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:194b-20: ma bsams pa'i kun rtog ni smon lam ste de'i
T02D1831:194b-21: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su ma bsams pa kho na
T02D1831:194b-22: las smon lam gyi don kun phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1831:194b-23: 'byung ngo // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis de'i thugs so //
T02D1831:194b-24: gos pa ni bag chags so //
T02D1831:194b-25: byang chub ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gis
T02D1831:194b-26: bde ba chen po mngon par 'byung ba ni snang
T02D1831:194b-27: ba la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1831:194b-28: las dang skye ba'i bag chags dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1831:194b-29: snang ba gsum spangs pa ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D1831:194b-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rtog pa'i gnas skabs su glo bur gyi dri ma dag pas so //
T02D1831:194b-31: rdo rje ye shes ni theg pa chen po'o //
T02D1831:194b-32: ye shes chen po ni zung 'jug go //
T02D1831:194b-34: sangs rgyas thams cad de goms pa las 'byung ba'i
T02D1831:194b-35: phyir de dang bdag gcig pa'i tshul du de la
T02D1831:194b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1831:194b-40: thog mtha' med pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:194b-41: zhi ba ni shes bya'i sgrib pa med pa'o //
T02D1831:194b-42: rim pa ni snang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1831:195a-1: pa ni brtan par bya ba'i ched du'o //
T02D1831:195a-2: zla ba'i 'od dang bcas pa'i mtshan mo'i cha ltar
T02D1831:195a-3: spro ba bskyed pa dang mi gsal ba snang ba'i
T02D1831:195a-6: nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'i nyin mo bzhin du gsal bar snang ba'i nyin mo ste /
T02D1831:195a-7: mchog tu dga' ba snang ba mched pa'o //
T02D1831:195a-8: mtshan ni shin du dmar ba bzhin du nyin mtshan
T02D1831:195a-9: ro gcig pa'i tshul gyis shin tu yid du 'ong
T02D1831:195a-11: dga' bral snang ba thob pa'o //
T02D1831:195a-12: 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa phra
T02D1831:195a-13: bar gyur pa bde bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i
T02D1831:195a-14: rnam rtog gi rang bzhin dag ni rim pa bzhin
T02D1831:195a-15: du snang ba gsum dang sbyar ro //
T02D1831:195a-16: kun rtog gsum pa des stong pa bde ba chen
T02D1831:195a-17: po'i snang ba dang ro gcig pa'i snang ba gsum
T02D1831:195a-18: dang lhan cig pa'i dga' ba byang chub kyi skad
T02D1831:195a-20: gang gi phyir don dam pa 'od gsal ba chos
T02D1831:195a-21: thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i byang chub ni kun
T02D1831:195a-22: rdzob lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba myong bas so
T02D1831:195a-23: sor lhag par rtogs pa ste /
T02D1831:195a-24: de dang bdag gcig tu 'od gsal ba'i phyir rnam par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:195a-25: la lar ni ldog pa tha dad par 'dod nas don tha dad par btags pa tsam yin no //
T02D1831:195a-26: dper na lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung yin la /
T02D1831:195a-27: de rang bzhin med pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs 'byung zhes bshad pa yin no //
T02D1831:195a-28: la lar ni de tha mi dad par smra bar
T02D1831:195a-29: 'dod pas tha mi dad par gzhag ste dper na
T02D1831:195a-31: rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas btab bsgom //
T02D1831:195a-33: bstan pa ni kun rdzob tu brjod pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D1831:195a-34: don dam par ni rnam par rtog pa dang /
T02D1831:195a-35: ngag tu brjod pa'i spyod yul ma yin no //
T02D1831:195a-36: de nyid kyi spyir gsungs pa /
T02D1831:195a-37: rnal 'byor ba nyid yul de rang gi rig par bya'o //
T02D1831:195a-38: 'jig rten las 'das pa 'od gsal ba dang ro
T02D1831:195a-39: gcig pa bde ba chen po byang chub mtshon par
T02D1831:195a-41: gang gi dpe 'di nges par mi nus pa la gsungs te /
T02D1831:195a-42: ngag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1831:195a-43: dri med ni yod pa dang med pa la sogs
T02D1831:195a-44: par sgro btags pa thams cad kyi rnyog mas ma
T02D1831:195b-0: gos pa'o // yang dag mtha' ni stong @195b pa nyid bshad par bya'o //
T02D1831:195b-1: slob mas kyang skad cig de la phyi'i byang chub
T02D1831:195b-2: kyi dper gyur ba mthong ba'i nges pas thob ste
T02D1831:195b-4: nang gi bde ba de yang kun rdzob kyi rang
T02D1831:195b-5: bzhin bde ba chen po dang don dam pa'i rang
T02D1831:195b-7: de ldog pa tha dad par yang yongs su brtags te /
T02D1831:195b-8: dang po ni skye ba dang gnas pa nyams pa'i chos dang ldan par rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1831:195b-9: gnyis pa ni de dang bral ba'o //
T02D1831:195b-10: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
T02D1831:195b-11: ma byung yang rung chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni gnas pa nyid de /
T02D1831:195b-12: dper na de bzhin nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1831:195b-13: bag chags la sogs pa dang yang bral ba yin te /
T02D1831:195b-14: 'di ltar 'gro ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1831:195b-15: dang 'ong ba ni snying rje chen pos 'khor ba
T02D1831:195b-16: ste / de gnyis 'di la med do //
T02D1831:195b-18: rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med de /
T02D1831:195b-19: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //
T02D1831:195b-20: zad pa ni sgrib pa dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D1831:195b-21: 'phel ba ni mngon par shes pa la sogs pa yon tan gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1831:195b-22: gang gi phyir gsungs pa dngos po brjod du med pa'o //
T02D1831:195b-23: nyams pa dang ni 'phel mi rung //
T02D1831:195b-25: dngos dang dngos min ni yod pa la sogs par
T02D1831:195b-26: sgro btags pa'i spros pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro
T02D1831:195b-27: // de nyid kyi phyir spros pa med pa'i chos
T02D1831:195b-28: sku yin yang kun rdzob kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba
T02D1831:195b-29: la sogs pa dang ldan pas ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02D1831:195b-30: ngo mtshar min pa ni sems rtag tu bden pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin pas so //
T02D1831:195b-31: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bas gnas pa min te /
T02D1831:195b-32: 'gro ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:195b-33: kun rdzob kyi tshul du ci rigs par yod pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad 'byung do //
T02D1831:195b-34: de nyid ni bden zhing mi slu ba bden pa
T02D1831:195b-35: gnyis tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid can zung du
T02D1831:195b-36: 'jug pa'i rim pa yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1831:195b-37: to // dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba de kho na nyid do zhes spyod bsdus su gsungs so //
T02D1831:195b-38: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'di'i ngo bo yin pas rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1831:195b-40: rnal 'byor gang dang gang dmigs pa //
T02D1831:195b-41: de ni bdag nyid bzhin du rtog //
T02D1831:196a-2: gang gi phyir bdag nyid du nye bar brtags nas
T02D1831:196a-3: bems po dang gzhan sems med pas ji ltar snying
T02D1831:196a-4: rje chen po la sogs pas 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig
T02D1831:196a-6: ye shes ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1831:196a-7: mi zad pa ni chos kyi sku stong pa nyid do //
T02D1831:196a-8: don gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1831:196a-9: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhi ba'i sku'o //
T02D1831:196a-10: zhi ba min na ni mchog tu gyur pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1831:196a-11: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yin pas gnas pa kho na'o //
T02D1831:196a-12: sangs rgyas mig ni shes rab kyi spyan phye bas so //
T02D1831:196a-13: lus la sogs pas bya ba byed kyang de bzhin
T02D1831:196a-14: nyid la sems brtan pas g-yo ba med pa'i phyir
T02D1831:196a-15: sems mnyam par bzhag pas so //
T02D1831:196a-16: de nyid kyi phyir dag gi brjod pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1831:196a-17: de lta bus lha dang mi'i yid du 'ong ba
T02D1831:196a-18: phun sum tshogs pa brtan pa'i phyir longs spyod ldan
T02D1831:196a-19: te / bla na med pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi la longs spyod pas kyang ngo //
T02D1831:196a-20: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba 'don pa la brtson pas 'jig rten mgon po'o //
T02D1831:196a-21: de ltar shes rab tu gyur pa 'dis ni stong
T02D1831:196a-22: nyid snying rje tha mi dad pa dag rdo rje
T02D1831:196a-23: 'dzin pa'i sku rang nyid dang ba dang bsam pa
T02D1831:196a-24: rgyun mi 'chad par goms par byed do //
T02D1831:196a-25: shes rab 'bring pos rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yang nas yang du stong par byas shing /
T02D1831:196a-26: dngos por 'dzin pa'i mdung pa grol ba dang ldan
T02D1831:196a-27: par bya zhing med par 'dzin par grol zhes bya
T02D1831:196a-28: ste man dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1831:196a-29: ril po ni lus de stong pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa ni ril por 'dzin no //
T02D1831:196a-30: 'gro ba thams cad 'od gsal du byas nas de'i
T02D1831:196a-31: rjes su rang 'dzin pa ni stong par byed pa
T02D1831:196a-33: stong pa nyid du rab tu zhugs pas ji ltar
T02D1831:196a-34: gzhan don byed ces gsungs pa de dang de gzugs
T02D1831:196a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1831:196a-36: de ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i kha
T02D1831:196a-37: dog dang ldan pa de dang de'i mdog dang mtshungs
T02D1831:196a-38: pa'i 'od zer rnams ni de dang de'i gzugs 'od
T02D1831:196a-39: zer ro // de dang yid kyi rang bzhin bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rang bzhin gyis kyang ngo //
T02D1831:196a-40: gnas skabs 'dir skye ba snga ma'i dri ma bkru ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1831:196b-0: 'od gsal du 'jug pa kho na la cher 'bad pas @196b lan 'ga' 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
T02D1831:196b-1: 'o na ni sems can gyi don la sogs pa ni ldang ba yod na 'byung ste /
T02D1831:196b-4: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1831:196b-5: rlung ba las ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa las so //
T02D1831:196b-6: sgyu 'phrul dra ba ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1831:196b-7: gsungs pa rigs zhes pa ste /
T02D1831:196b-8: sangs rgyas lnga'i rigs rnam ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D1831:196b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' gang la ltos pa yin pa de de bzhin no //
T02D1831:196b-10: phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur rang nyid ldan par bya ste /
T02D1831:196b-11: spros pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'od zer
T02D1831:196b-12: dag gis sems can gyi don mdzad par bsgom par
T02D1831:196b-13: bya'o // de lta bur gyur pa'i bdag nyid dang
T02D1831:196b-14: ro gcig pa'i tshul du rang bzhin med par bsgom
T02D1831:196b-15: par la khyad par du sbyar ba'i phyir bshad de
T02D1831:196b-16: bya'o // / thams cad stong pa'i gzhi la gnas //
T02D1831:196b-18: gang gi phyir thams cad stong pa nyid rang bzhin
T02D1831:196b-19: med par bsgoms pas bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib
T02D1831:196b-20: pa ma lus par spangs pa'i rang bzhin glo bur
T02D1831:196b-21: gyi dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1831:196b-22: de ltar bla mas gsungs pa la des par byas
T02D1831:196b-23: pa'i snang ba la sogs pa rang rig tu rtogs
T02D1831:196b-25: slob ma la dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i
T02D1831:196b-26: zhes pa nas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1831:196b-27: kyi bar du brjod cing gnyis su med par dmigs

T02D1831:203a-18: dpag bsam shing 'khrungs 'gro rnams skye dang yongs su smin pa'i gzhi //
T02D1831:203a-19: bdag kyang yun rings gnyis med gnas ni 'gro la nyer bstan cing //
T02D1831:203a-20: dga' bcas tshogs la sku chen rol pas thub pa'i dbang phyug gyur //
T02D1831:203a-21: rim lnga'i dgongs 'grel zla ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba /
T02D1831:203a-22: panda ti chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
